entry.title: Mount Rwenzori centennial climb
entry.content: The first group of photos show the hike, while the other groups show the vegetation zonation from the foot hill to the peak: montane forests, bamboo forest, giant heather forest, alpine vegetation (including lobelias) and last the crater and peak region dominated by lichens and mosses.
entry.summary: The first group of photos show the hike, while the other groups show the vegetation zonation from the foot hill to the peak: montane forests, bamboo forest, giant heather forest, alpine vegetation (including lobelias) and last the crater and peak region dominated by lichens and mosses.

entry.title: Lake Kyoga boat survey photos
entry.content: Photos taken during reconnaissance boating on Lake Kyoga in Ocotber 2002. Photos taken by Camilla Andersson and Thomas Gumbricht. Slide cursor over images to view clear photo, click any image to see all photos in large size.
entry.summary: Photos taken during reconnaissance boating on Lake Kyoga in Ocotber 2002. Photos taken by Camilla Andersson and Thomas Gumbricht. Slide cursor over images to view clear photo, click any image to see all photos in large size.
